√val 'turn'

present: [1.] valati  valate etc.  

perfect: vavale  

[aorist: avīvalat  avaliṣṭa  valiṣyati  valitā  ]

verbal: valitá  valitvā  

secondary: causative: valayati  

derivatives: valana  vali? E.+  valaya E.+  

Evidently a secondary root-form, probably from √1vṛ, through some derivative.
